projects.name: Vehicle Routing Optimization Platform (Niagara Bottling, US)
desc: Engineered a large-scale optimization system; reduced solve time from 60 minutes to under 5 minutes for 100+ orders.
Rebuilt routing engine with Python and Gurobi Cloud; enabled daily re-runs and automated reporting.
Delivered secure CI/CD with Azure DevOps and MuleSoft integration for fully automated optimization.
Achieved ~15% logistics cost savings via vehicle utilization and flexible-quantity handling.
Recognized for replacing legacy AMPL/Oracle with a flexible production-grade solution.
projects.tech: Python, Gurobi, Pandas, Azure DevOps, Oracle DB, Docker, Kubernetes

projects.name: Salesforce GenAI Email & Sentiment Automation (Internal)
desc: Built an enterprise LLM platform for email generation and sentiment analysis with strict privacy controls.
Implemented prompt masking/unmasking and GDPR-aligned trust boundaries; real-time APIs via FastAPI.
Benchmarked LLaMA 3 and PHI-3; reduced LLM costs by up to 65% vs Einstein GPT.
Delivered CI/CD for model updates, monitoring, and scalable deployment on Azure Container Apps.
projects.tech: Python, LLaMA 3, PHI-3, HuggingFace, LangChain, LlamaIndex, FastAPI, Azure Container Apps, MLflow

projects.name: AI-Powered Document Receiving & Processing
desc: Automated extraction of structured data from invoices/POs/shipping docs using OCR + transformer NLP.
Built LangChain RAG pipelines for document classification and routing; cut manual work by ~80%.
Deployed on Databricks + Airflow with ERP integrations and feature store for continuous improvement.
projects.tech: Python, HuggingFace, OCR, LangChain, LlamaIndex, Airflow, Databricks, Spark, AWS S3

projects.name: Cart Abandonment Prediction & Segmentation (Omega Engineering)
desc: Developed ML pipelines on multi-year behavioral data; achieved ~92% accuracy (F1=0.92).
Created 9 actionable segments integrated into Salesforce Data Cloud for personalized campaigns.
Tracked with MLflow and visualized impact via Tableau/Power BI for A/B testing.
projects.tech: Python, scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, SMOTE, Salesforce Data Cloud, MLflow, Tableau, Power BI

title: Lead Data Scientist (Data Manager)
company: University of Chicago — IRD Global, Karachi, Pakistan

projects.name: Vaccination Timeliness Prediction
desc: Built predictive models on 2.6M+ events; 87% accuracy and 98% recall for critical vaccines.
Addressed severe class imbalance with SMOTE; integrated into the Azm mobile app for frontline use.
Enabled prioritization across 12 districts and operationalized a sustainable MLOps pipeline.
projects.tech: Python, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, Logistic Regression, SMOTE, MLflow, Airflow

projects.name: Digital Health Data Platform & Real-Time Analytics
desc: Deployed cloud platform processing 1K+ records/day from 200+ field workers with robust ETL.
Built workflows on AWS S3 + Airflow + dbt; delivered real-time dashboards for coverage and KPIs.
Improved reliability with Kafka streaming and completeness monitoring.
projects.tech: Python, Airflow, dbt, SQL, AWS S3, Kafka, Tableau, Power BI

title: Senior Data Scientist
company: Federation of Pakistan Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FPCCI), Pakistan

projects.name: Gravity Model for Exports
desc: Estimated untapped $1.07B in horticulture exports using PPML gravity modeling.
Identified high-potential markets and product categories to inform cold-chain investments.
projects.tech: Python, Trade Map, FAO, IMF, World Bank

projects.name: Loan Default Prediction
desc: Engineered 20+ features; trained ML models to 92% ROC-AUC; reduced defaults by ~18%.
Integrated model into loan decisioning API; cut underwriting time by ~60%.
projects.tech: Python, scikit-learn, XGBoost, SQL, REST API

projects.name: Real-Time Risk Scoring Platform
desc: Developed scoring models on 50K+ loan records; reached 92% ROC-AUC; reduced defaults by 18%.
Containerized services with Docker and tracked experiments with MLflow; prepared for SageMaker scale.
